parameters.name: dealType
parameters.description: The Foreign Exchange deal type i.e. it is a Spot, Forward or a Swap transaction

parameters.name: buyCurrency
parameters.description: The SWIFT code of the currency of the purchase

parameters.name: sellCurrency
parameters.description: The SWIFT code of the sold currency.

parameters.name: sellAmount
parameters.description: The amount of the currency being sold.

parameters.name: dealDate
parameters.description: The date on which the deal was made.

parameters.name: dealerDesk
parameters.description: Code used to identify the dealing desk responsible for monitoring and managing Foreign exchange positions

parameters.name: unevenSwap
parameters.description: Defines the Foreign Exchange Swap transaction as an unven swap i.e. the base currency amount on near leg is not equals to the far leg base currency amount

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

dealType.description: The Foreign Exchange deal type i.e. it is a Spot, Forward or a Swap transaction

counterpartyName.description: The name that is displayed for the counter party

dealDate.description: The date on which the deal was made.

buyCurrency.description: The SWIFT code of the currency of the purchase

sellCurrency.description: The SWIFT code of the sold currency.

sellAmount.description: The amount of the currency being sold.

unevenSwap.description: Defines the Foreign Exchange Swap transaction as an unven swap i.e. the base currency amount on near leg is not equals to the far leg base currency amount

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
